about_the_game:
Step into the role of a Cosmic Guardian in this high-octane 2D classic space shooter, where your mission is to protect Earth from interstellar dangers. Stand as the planet's last line of defense, embarking on a quest to vanquish massive alien bosses and secure the universe's survival.

Dive into the adventure solo with A.I. support or join forces with a friend in cooperative mode using a second controller. Progress through the game by leveling up your hero and unlocking powerful new abilities. Uncover a variety of power-ups hidden throughout the universe to keep the action fast-paced and intense.

Utilize the energy of celestial constellations to strengthen your efforts in the cosmic war. Spend time within their zones of influence to activate their powers, and if the moon aligns with your constellation, a rare crystal power-up will appear to boost your arsenal.

VARIETY OF SKILLS AT YOUR DISPOSAL

Each skill plays a crucial role in helping you fend off potential space dangers. Using skills will consume energy points. Level up to boost your skills and make them even more powerful!

ZODIAC COSMIC POWERS

Unlock the powers of various zodiac signs by spending time within their designated zones to harness their unique abilities for a limited duration.

DEFEND THE EARTH

Shield the Earth from looming space threats. Stay alert for asteroids, alien invaders, and massive monster bosses.

MOON CRYSTAL POWER-UPS

Obtain a Moon Crystal by activating a zodiac sign when the moon aligns with its coordinates. Each crystal contains unique power-ups.

COLOSSAL BOSS MONSTERS

Face off against unique and powerful space bosses, each with their own special attacks and abilities. Battle enormous monsters in the depths of space as you fight to protect Earth and survive the epic clash.

Get the game now and dive into Invasion Mode!

Story Mode is coming soon.
